Posts.Content: Dec 14, 2012 12:41PM emorales26 wrote: Hi, I am 35. Had my lumpectomy on nov.1. My lump was 2.5 cm. I had 3 nodes removed and they were negative. My doc said my stage is a 2a. I go back on the 17th for my oncotype report. Kinda nervous waiting on the info. All this can be overwhelming. Very happy to know there are other women with the same feelings I have:) hugs to all of you;)
Posts.Title: IDC, 1 cm, Stage 2A, Grade 3, clear margins w/Lump -Anyone Else? del3 Robin3
